name: stargazer_metrics
description: Metrics related to stargazers in the GitHub repository, including counts and user interactions.

dimensions.name: starred_at
dimensions.description: The timestamp when the star was given.

dimensions.name: stargazer_login
dimensions.description: The login of the user who gave the star.

measures.name: total_stars
measures.description: The total number of stars the repository has received.

measures.name: first_star_giver
measures.description: The user who gave the first star to the repository.

measures.name: last_star_giver
measures.description: The user who gave the last star to the repository.

measures.name: stars_given_in_november
measures.description: The number of stars given in November.
measures.expr: SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM starred_at) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

measures.name: most_stars_given_day
measures.description: The day when the most stars were given.

sample_questions: How many stars does the repo have?
Who gave the first star, last star?
What day were the most stars given?
What days of the week were most stars given?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT starred_at, user__login AS stargazer_login FROM stargazers.stargazers
